snippet: Ryan Hunter-Reay, coming off two straight victories on road courses, showed he could dominate on a street course when he cruised to the Honda Indy Toronto title Sunday.
abstract: Ryan Hunter-Reay wins the Honda Indy Toronto to mark his third consecutive victory in the IndyCar Series; other auto racing news noted.
lead_paragraph: Ryan Hunter-Reay, coming off two straight victories on road courses, showed he could dominate on a street course when he cruised to the Honda Indy Toronto title Sunday.

headline.seo: Hunter-Reay Captures IndyCar Race in Toronto
headline.main: Hunter-Reay Captures IndyCar Race in Toronto
headline.print_headline: Hunter-Reay Captures IndyCar Race in Toronto
